locations: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil::(Brazil)
imdb.plot outline: In "Reform of Couples", GNT's new daily reality decoration, a room where the couple usually hangs together will be reproduced twice in real size, in a TV studio, and with the help of our team of architects each will Be able to decorate the environment as you have always dreamed. A vote with jurors, indicated by the couple, and with the participation of the internet, will choose the winning decoration. And the best: they only find out who won when they return home and find the space completely renovated. Would you risk the decoration of your dreams in a competition with the love of your life? "Reform of Couples" premieres on May 1st, at 7:00 p.m., and airs daily.
imdb.title: Reforma de Casais
